item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Members,

We haven't had a get together in a while, so I thought I'd start the New Year off right! Please come and join us for a wonderful evening of singing and Karaoke! No experience necessary, we welcome both expert singers and novices. Come one, call all.

-Phil

PS. I see a couple of comments from people objecting to the $10 fee so I wanted to clarify.

The Boston Karaoke Meetup Group has reserved the Karaoke System for 2 hours on that night from 7 to 9PM. That reservation gives us control of the microphone and Karaoke Courtside charges for that. I think that is fair and have no objection to them charging us. The $10 fee will be used to defray those costs.

Thank you for your understanding.

-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a My Name Tag On or call my cell phone( 617-429-6571)
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - January 24th 2009
